General.Name: Gohigh Data Networks Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Gohigh Networks Co.,Ltd. engages in digital intelligence application, information service, and IT sales business in China. The company offers industrial internet, internet of vehicles, and cloud computing services, as well as IDC and digital marketing services. It also offers mobile Internet services. The company was formerly known as Gohigh Data Networks Technology Co., Ltd and changed its name to Gohigh Networks Co.,Ltd. in May 2022. Gohigh Networks Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: Datang Telecom Group Complex, Beijing, China, 100083
